# Summary
In this post, I'm going to test adding some R-code, then mixing R-code with markdown.
Let's see if it works!

## Enter the R
### Keep the input
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(datasets)
data(iris)
summary(iris)

ggplot() + geom_point(data=iris,aes(x=Sepal.Length,y=Sepal.Width,color=Species))
```

### Only display the output!
```{r echo=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(datasets)
data(iris)

ggplot() + geom_point(data=iris,aes(x=Sepal.Length,y=Sepal.Width,color=Species))
```
